Texts.Chs: ^orange;筛粉机^reset;需要电力才能运作，它作用于沙、砾石等松散材料，从其中筛选出有用材料。快去制作一个^orange;木制筛粉机^reset;吧，虽说它效率有些慢。
Texts.Eng: A ^orange;Sifter^reset; requires power, but allows you to toss in sand, gravel and other loose materials and sift for hidden goodies. Very useful. The wood sifter is quite slow. But one cannot complain about free resources. Try building a ^orange;Wooden Sifter^reset; now.

If you want to step up your game, try creating a ^orange;Router^reset; and a ^orange;Storage Bridge^reset;, then link them to the Sifter! You'll be able to automatically transfer from a crafting station to a storage container!
